dimensions.label: Sense of Humor
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin use humor to cope with stress?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use biting sarcasm to deflect or make pointed comments.
Your FarTwin will use humor to diffuse tension and create a lighthearted atmosphere.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down problems into smaller, manageable parts and analyze each component.
Your FarTwin will rely on instincts and experience to guide their decision-making process.

dimensions.label: Motivation Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin be motivated to take action?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be driven by personal interests and a desire for self-improvement.
Your FarTwin will be motivated by external factors such as recognition, reward, or social pressure.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prefer to learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through visual aids such as images, diagrams, or videos.
Your FarTwin will learn best through audio-based materials such as lectures, podcasts, or audiobooks.

dimensions.label: Conflict Resolution Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin resolve conflicts with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use assertive language and direct confrontation to resolve disputes.
Your FarTwin will work to find a mutually beneficial solution through compromise and active listening.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will express themselves through writing, public speaking, or storytelling.
Your FarTwin will express themselves through art, music, or other visual mediums.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach global issues?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus primarily on local concerns and may be less invested in international affairs.
Your FarTwin will consider the global implications of their actions and decisions.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize flexibility and adaptability in their scheduling.
Your FarTwin will prefer a structured approach to planning and organization.
